results.definition: European strong-scented perennial herb with grey-green bitter-tasting leaves; an irritant similar to poison ivy
leaves sometimes used for flavoring fruit or claret cup but should be used with great caution: can cause irritation like poison ivy
sadness associated with some wrong done or some disappointment
examples: he drank to drown his sorrows
he wrote a note expressing his regret
to his rue, the error cost him the game

results.definition: (French) a street or road in France
feel remorse for; feel sorry for; be contrite about
